Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurrences across all cases
Percentage of cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' is followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that occur after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in variants that eventually lead to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in variants that include 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Ratio of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that also contain at least one 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in cases that experience reviewer selection delays (e.g., activities like 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days', 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due', or 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late')
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that are followed within 7 days by a reviewer response activity ('SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', or 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable')
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in variants with performance duration above the median case duration
Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurrences that happen more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Ratio of cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' appears without any subsequent 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to total cases containing 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that directly precede 'Assign a Different Editor'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in cases that ultimately result in 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' or 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
